00059 #ifndef L_PIPE_UTIL_H
00060 #define L_PIPE_UTIL_H

00066 /*************************************************************************
00067                 General Macros
00068 *************************************************************************/
00069 
00070 /* code generation schemas */
00071 #define REM_LOOP 0
00072 #define MULTI_EPI 1
00073 #define MULTI_EPI_ROT_REG 2
00074 #define KERNEL_ONLY 3
00075 
00076 #define IS_MDES_FLAG_CBR(a) ( op_flag_set(a->proc_opc, OP_FLAG_CBR) || \
00077                              (op_flag_set(a->proc_opc, OP_FLAG_JMP) && \
00078                              IS_PREDICATED(a)) )
00079 #define IS_MDES_FLAG_BR(a) ( op_flag_set(a->proc_opc, OP_FLAG_CBR) || \
00080                              op_flag_set(a->proc_opc, OP_FLAG_JMP) )
00081 
00082 /*************************************************************************
00083                 Data Structures
00084 *************************************************************************/
00085 
00086 /* Queue data structures */
00087 
00088 typedef struct Qnode
00089 {
00090   SM_Oper *oper;
00091   int priority;
00092   struct Qnode *next_qnode;
00093   struct Qnode *prev_qnode;
00094 }
00095 Qnode;
00096 
00097 typedef struct Queue
00098 {
00099   Qnode *head;
00100   Qnode *tail;
00101 }
00102 Queue;

00104 /*************************************************************************
00105                 Lsoftpipe Global Parameter Declarations
00106 *************************************************************************/
00107 
00108 /* parms that affect phase 1 loop preparation only */
00109 extern int Lpipe_do_induction_reversal; /* move induction operations
00110                                            from the end of the loop
00111                                            body to the beginning */
00112 extern int Lpipe_check_loops_in_phase1; /* check to see if loops marked
00113                                            for pipelining are still OK
00114                                            for pipelining at beginning
00115                                            of phase 1 */
00116 
00117 /* parms that affect phase 1 and phase 2 of code generation */
00118 extern char *Lpipe_schema_name; /* code generation schema name */
00119 extern int Lpipe_schema;        /* integer code for schema */
00120 
00121 
00122 /* parms that affect phase 2 only */
00123 extern int Lpipe_backward_sched;        /* schedule from last operation
00124                                            to first operation - default 
00125                                            is first to last */
00126 extern float Lpipe_budget_ratio;        /* ratio of the number of 
00127                                            scheduling steps performed
00128                                            before giving up to the
00129                                            number of operations in the
00130                                            loop body */
00131 extern int Lpipe_min_ii;        /* If nonzero, limit ii
00132                                    to the specified value.
00133                                    (debug flag) */
00134 extern int Lpipe_max_ii;        /* Prevent pipelining when II is too large. */
00135 extern int Lpipe_max_stages;    /* Increase II until loop is under this
00136                                    many stages. */
00137 extern int Lpipe_max_tries;     /* Try this many different IIs before
00138                                    giving up. */
00139 
00140 extern int Lpipe_fixed_slots_for_branches;      /* processor has fixed
00141                                                    slots for branches, so 
00142                                                    don't change slots when 
00143                                                    sorting */
00144 extern int Lpipe_do_only_postpass_steps;        /* assume modulo scheduling
00145                                                    was done in an earlier Lcode
00146                                                    pass, so only mark loops 
00147                                                    with spills */
00148 
00149 /* parms that affect phase 2 optimization only */
00150 extern int Lpipe_compact_branch_path_opers;     /* compact opers on
00151                                                    which the loop back
00152                                                    branch depends and
00153                                                    shift them upward
00154                                                    in schedule to
00155                                                    reduce speculation.
00156                                                    Only works for
00157                                                    counted loops. */
00158 extern int Lpipe_sort_mrt_rows; /* sort opers within each row
00159                                    of MRT to reduce register
00160                                    pressure and speculation */
00161 
00162 extern int Lpipe_combine_cbs;   /* after softpipe, merge created cbs that 
00163                                    fall through into one another. */
00164 
00165 /* parms that affect debugging only */
00166 extern int Lpipe_debug;         /* print debug information */
00167  /* If debug_use_cb_bounds is set to yes, the pipeliner will only
00168     pipeline those cbs with ids between the upper and lower bound.
00169     I.e., set both upper and lower bound to 10 to pipeline only cb
00170     10. */
00171 extern int Lpipe_debug_use_cb_bounds;
00172 extern int Lpipe_debug_lower_cb_bound;
00173 extern int Lpipe_debug_upper_cb_bound;
00174 extern int Lpipe_print_statistics;      /* Attach attributes to header
00175                                            cb containing stats about each 
00176                                            loop such as II, unroll, etc.
00177                                            Print statistics on pipelined
00178                                            loops in file softpipe.stats */
00179 extern int Lpipe_print_iteration_schedule;      /* for each loop,
00180                                                    print the schedule
00181                                                    for a single
00182                                                    iteration to file */
00183 extern int Lpipe_print_schedules_for_debug;     /* for each loop,
00184                                                    print the schedule
00185                                                    for the header cb
00186                                                    to file at various
00187                                                    points in the
00188                                                    scheduling process */
00189 extern int Lpipe_print_mve_summary;     /* for each loop, print the
00190                                            length of each lifetime and
00191                                            the number of names
00192                                            required for MVE to stdout */
00193 
00194 extern int Lpipe_print_acyclic_stats;   /* print statistics for acyclicly
00195                                            scheduled loops that are
00196                                            potentially pipelineable */
00197 extern int Lpipe_compute_loop_reg_pressure;     /* compute register
00198                                                    pressure for each
00199                                                    loop and print to
00200                                                    file */
00201 extern int Lpipe_add_spill_attributes;  /* add attribute indicating
00202                                            the number of spill code
00203                                            opers in the loop for each
00204                                            register type */
00205 
00206 extern int Lpipe_dump_dot;
00207
